metadata.description:
# NEAR Books

NEAR Books is like goodreads but decentralized. The more books you add, the more they will get indexed onto the NEAR Chain, effectively migrating all book info onto the decentralized network eventually.

## Feed

The feed will show you all the activity happening from who you are following. This will act like a timeline of sorts comparatively to other sorts of social networks.


## Search

Search for books and add them to your collection. The added books will trigger a transaction call to add the book to the NEAR chain. This will only happen if the booked hasn't been indexed yet.


## Future

This is not the end all state of this sort of application. This can be applied not only to books but other sources of interests like movies or comics.
metadata.name: NEAR Books
